He {} {} through the large tunnel that led to its {} {}. I got some peanuts and passed them through the cage to a gigantic gray {} towering above my head. Feeding that animal made me hungry. I went to get a {} scoop of ice cream. It filled my stomach. Afterwards I had to {}  {} to catch our bus.When I got home I {} my mom for a {} day at the zoo.
